channel.title: HybridScape Server
channel.description: I searched everywhere (even on YouTube for some kind of video tutorial) and I'm really sorry I had to post this stupid question here I just don't get how to log onto HybridScape, the start server thing. Do I need a port or should I just refresh the page and start over and press Start Server button? When I do that I get the IP address 127.0.0.1 and I don't even check the port thing. Do I need to port forward to get onto HybridScape? Errr what? Could some one just make me a short little tutorial how to log on or just answer a few of my questions please? Thanks! :D[br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2007, 07:56:47 AM[/size][hr]Sorry I said do I need a port In my last post and I don't know how to edit it so I'll just correct my mistake here. I said port and I meant to say port forward sorry :)

item.title: HybridScape Server
item.dc:creator: @Logank96 Logank96
item.description:
@Logank96 wrote:

Okay this is what I do when I try to log into hybridscape, tell me if I do anything wrong. First I click the refresh button on my browser and then I click start server next to the enter button it says something with “Have fun!” in it and I click okay then I click enter then type in my desired user and pass then I click the log in button. Tell me if I did anything wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: HybridScape Server
item.dc:creator: @ownedu1 ownedu1
item.description:
@ownedu1 wrote:

no you dont need to port forward

Read full topic

item.title: HybridScape Server
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

you click start server, now go back. and run it? You don’t need anything open for hybridscape, only the moparscape client.

Read full topic

item.title: HybridScape Server

item.description:
@Logank96 wrote:

I searched everywhere (even on YouTube for some kind of video tutorial) and I’m really sorry I had to post this stupid question here I just don’t get how to log onto HybridScape, the start server thing. Do I need a port or should I just refresh the page and start over and press Start Server button? When I do that I get the IP address 127.0.0.1 and I don’t even check the port thing. Do I need to port forward to get onto HybridScape? Errr what? Could some one just make me a short little tutorial how to log on or just answer a few of my questions please? Thanks!
